Title: View All Products - Success
Description: Verify that an admin can retrieve the list of all products with complete details and inventory status.
Acceptance Criteria: Response body contains a list of products.
Each product includes: id, name, description, price, category, images, inventoryStatus.

Title: View All Products - No Products
Description: Verify that the API returns an empty list when there are no products in the catalog.
Acceptance Criteria: Response body contains an empty array.

Title: Add Product - Valid Data
Description: Verify that an admin can add a new product with valid details.
Acceptance Criteria: Location header contains new product URL.
GET on new product returns correct details.

Title: Add Product - Missing Required Fields
Description: Verify that the API returns an error when required fields are missing.
Acceptance Criteria: Response contains details of missing fields (e.g., name, price).

Title: Add Product - Invalid Price
Description: Verify that the API rejects a product with a negative price.

Title: Add Product - Duplicate Name
Description: Verify that the API enforces uniqueness of product name (if required by business rule).
Acceptance Criteria: API returns 409 Conflict or 400 Bad Request.

Title: Update Product - Valid Update
Description: Verify that an admin can update all modifiable fields of a product.
Acceptance Criteria: GET on product reflects updated fields.

Title: Update Product - Nonexistent Product
Description: Verify that updating a nonexistent product returns an error.

Title: Update Product - Invalid Field Values
Description: Verify that updating a product with invalid data (e.g., empty name, invalid price) returns error.

Title: Delete Product - Success
Description: Verify that an admin can delete (mark as inactive or remove) a product.
Acceptance Criteria: API returns 200 OK or 204 No Content.
GET on product returns not found or inactive status.

Title: Delete Product - Nonexistent Product
Description: Verify that deleting a nonexistent product returns an error.

Title: Update Inventory - Valid Update
Description: Verify that an admin can update the inventory level for a product.
Acceptance Criteria: GET on product shows updated inventory level.

Title: Update Inventory - Negative Inventory
Description: Verify that the API rejects setting a negative inventory value.
Acceptance Criteria: Error message indicates invalid inventory value.

Title: Update Inventory - Nonexistent Product
Description: Verify that updating inventory for a nonexistent product returns an error.

Title: Boundary - Max Field Lengths
Description: Verify that the API correctly handles maximum allowed lengths for product fields (e.g., name, description).
Acceptance Criteria: API returns 201 Created or 200 OK for valid lengths.
API returns 400 Bad Request for exceeding max lengths.

Title: Boundary - Large Inventory Value
Description: Verify that the API accepts and correctly processes very large but valid inventory values.
Acceptance Criteria: Inventory value reflects the large number.

Title: Edge - Add Product With No Images
Description: Verify that an admin can add a product without images (if images are optional).
Acceptance Criteria: Product is created and image field is empty or null.

Title: Edge - Special Characters in Fields
Description: Verify that the API accepts special characters in product name and description.
Acceptance Criteria: Special characters are correctly stored and retrieved.
